option.od: print the help message and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
files are in the grdmap format.
filename of the grdmap format file. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Creates an index of a grdmap format file.

description.p: Creates an index of a grdmap format file.
The index is written to standard output.
Index files cannot be created for grd format files with this utility.

example.description: Create an index file for the grdmap format file "20040830.grdmap". The index is writen to the file "20040830.grdinx".
